channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Business One License service API
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Business One License service API

item.title: CVE-2022-28771|2024-08-03T06:03:52.657Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20one%20license%20service%20api
item.description: Due to missing authentication check, SAP Business one License service API - version 10.0 allows an unauthenticated attacker to send malicious http requests over the network. On successful exploitation, an attacker can break the whole application making it inaccessible.
